price: 161 lorsque l’un des leurs, Loth, leur dit : « Ne craignez-vous pas le Seigneur ?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūna
